title: ‘I can’t believe you made that’ cake
description: This cake is dramatic, delicious and versatile: decorate with fresh flowers for a christening or wedding cake, top with strawberries or raspberries for something girly, or add quartered figs for a Father’s day cake.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 20cm/8in round deep cake tin and a 20cm/8in cake board.
ingredients: 400g/14oz plain, milk, or white chocolate cigarillos (about 75–80 in total)
100g/3½oz good dark chocolate (at least 70 per cent cocoa solids), melted and slightly cooled
fresh flowers, for a Christening cake
strawberries or raspberries, for the girls
